name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Mary Anne KIRLIN

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Mary Anne KIRLIN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Sandra L. Elias, Deputy Dist. Atty., Dennis C. McAndrews, Asst. Dist. Atty., John A. Reilly, Dist. Atty., Media, for appellant.
Raymond R. Williams, Asst. Public Defender, Media, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
526 A.2d 356
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Mary Anne KIRLIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 14, 1987.
Decided June 1, 1987.
Sandra L. Elias, Deputy Dist. Atty., Dennis C. McAndrews, Asst. Dist. Atty., John A. Reilly, Dist. Atty., Media, for appellant.
Raymond R. Williams, Asst. Public Defender, Media, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
